comments.body: Shouldn't this be exported? I get `File '/node_modules/@types/pica/index.d.ts' is not a module.  TS2306` if nothing is exported from this file.

Pica is a UMD module (meaning it works as a global, an AMD module, or a CommonJS module). So while it’s not exactly _wrong_ to simply declare it as a global, it’s incomplete. There should be an `export as namespace Pica` to indicate it’s available as UMD.
